gold.user: User wants to retrieve a list of IP addresses associated with a specific SIP IP Access Control List to manage access.
gold.ideal: Returns a JSON array of IP addresses with details such as SID and friendly name.

gold.user: User needs to add a new IP address to the SIP IP Access Control List for enhanced security.
gold.ideal: Creates a new IP address entry and returns the SID and details of the created IP address.

gold.user: User wants to fetch details of a specific IP address to verify its configuration.
gold.ideal: Returns detailed information about the specified IP address including its SID and friendly name.

gold.user: User needs to update the details of an existing IP address in the SIP IP Access Control List.
gold.ideal: Updates the IP address entry and returns the updated details including SID and friendly name.

gold.user: User wants to remove an IP address from the SIP IP Access Control List to restrict access.
gold.ideal: Deletes the specified IP address and confirms the deletion with a success message.
